allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Database Migration Helper with mapping and FK support

Features:
- Interactive field mapping UI for Project table
- Support for const values, direct mapping, and default values
- FK (Foreign Key) mapping with value translation
- Save/Load mapping configurations to JSON files
- Migration execution with detailed logging
- Connection testing for MSSQL and MySQL
- Complete SQL schemas for old and new databases

\ud83e\udd16 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
